benchmark_details.name: MTOP (Multilingual Task-Oriented Semantic Parsing)
benchmark_details.overview: We present a new multilingual dataset, called MTOP, comprising of 100k annotated utterances in 6 languages across 11 domains to facilitate task-oriented semantic parsing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To scale semantic parsing models for task-oriented dialog systems to new languages effectively and efficiently.

data.source: Generated and annotated by crowdsourced workers, with translations and post-processing for six languages.
data.annotation: Generated synthetic utterances and annotated in English, followed by translation and label transfer.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the number of correctly predicted slots and intents compared to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher exact match accuracy and slot F1 indicate better model performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Exact match accuracy for best in-language model is 77.7%.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated through extensive quality control and annotation revision processes.
